videos.headline: Virginia defense comes up big with interception
videos.description: Juan Thornhill intercepts Richard Lagow's pass to put Virginia in Indiana territory in the second quarter.

videos.headline: Indiana scores on 29-yard TD catch and run
videos.description: Jr. Simmie Cobbs catches a pass from Peyton Ramsey and dodges multiple defenders on his way to the end zone.

videos.headline: Ramsey uses his legs to score TD for Indiana
videos.description: Peyton Ramsey keeps the ball and breaks for a 26-yard run to the end zone that extends the Hoosier's lead.

videos.headline: Virginia defense gets drive-ending sack
videos.description: Micah Kiser sacks Peyton Ramsey for a loss of 15 yards which forces the Hoosiers to punt.

videos.headline: Virginia scores on rushing TD from Ellis
videos.description: Jordan Ellis runs untouched for 12-yards for the Cavaliers first touchdown of the game.

videos.headline: Hoosiers extend lead with 32-yard TD from Ramsey
videos.description: Peyton Ramsey rolls out of the pocket and throws a sharp 32-yard pass to Donavan Hale in the end zone.

videos.headline: Indiana TD overturned by targeting penalty
videos.description: Greg Gooch hits Kirk Benkert to force a fumble and Indiana picks it up to score an apparent touchdown, but Gooch is called for targeting negating the touchdown.

videos.headline: Virginia cuts Indiana's lead with TD to Reed
videos.description: Joe Reed catches a swing pass from Kurt Benkert and takes it to the end zone to cut the Hoosiers lead in the fourth quarter.

videos.headline: Hoosiers extend lead with punt return TD
videos.description: J-Shun Harris II returns a punt 44 yards resulting in a touchdown for Indiana.
